title: Bad fps
body:
I have been having a problem with my fps lately, ever since I restarted my computer. I do a solid 60 fps straight after getting in the game but after a few minutes I just do around 20 - 30, I mean it's playable but I know I can do better than that. Iv tried everything to fix but nothing seems to work :/

Any ideas would be helpful, thanks {{sticker:katarina-love}}
